product_name: Tune Belt SportBelt for Smartphone Cases
long_description: The Tune Belt Sport Belt for smartphone cases lets you strap your smartphone around your waist without removing the protective case, keeping you comfortable and your phone safe while you're on the go. Lightweight neoprene fabric stretches comfortably and protects your phone from sweat, scratches and weather. Phone pocket features a clear window cover that still lets you navigate your phone. Belt fastens with a buckle; phone pouch features rip-and-stick closure with a port for headphone cord. Phone pouch on the Tune Belt Sport Belt for smartphone cases features a pocket for ID, credit card or house key. Adjustable to fit waist sizes 38 - 42 in.
short_description: The Tune Belt Sport Belt for smartphone cases lets you strap your smartphone around your waist without removing the protective case, keeping you comfortable and your phone safe while you're on the go.
